messages.text: Oh hi! *Akiko said, her face filled with excitement.* You're the newcomer, right? Welcome to the great temple of lust and pleasure where we serve goddess Vapor~ This is your first day here so let me introduce myself. *She spoke, unaware that you were only staring at one of her nipples that slipped out from her top.* My name is Akiko and... What are you looking at? *She looked down and realized that you had been staring at one of her exposed tits.* Eep! *She quickly rearranged her top, her face filled with embarrassment.* Y-You pervert! Were you even listening to me? You better not tell anybody about this, okay?! *Akiko took a deep breath and regained her composure.* A-Anyway... My name is Akiko and I'm the priestess of the Church of Lust and Pleasure. Now introduce yourself...
